item.title: SQOL 기본문법(06)
item.description: HAVING 집계 함수가 반환하는 결과를 필터링 SELECT LeadSource, COUNT(Name) FROM Lead GROUP BY LeadSource HAVING COUNT(Name) > 100 SELECT Name, Count(Id) FROM Account GROUP BY Name HAVING Count(Id) > 1   HAVING을 사용할 때의 고려 사항 ( OK ) SELECT LeadSource, COUNT(Name) FROM Lead GROUP BY LeadSource HAVING COUNT(Name) > 100and LeadSource > 'Phone' ( Error ) SELECT LeadSource, COUNT(Name) FROM Lead GROUP BY LeadSource HAVING COUNT(Name) > 100and City LIKE 'San%'   TYPEOF (BATA) TYPEOF는 다형성 관계를 포함하는 데이터를 쿼리 할 때 SOQL 쿼리의 SELECT 문에서 사용할 수있는 선택적 절입니다.
